dcterms:creator: Timo von Marcard
Roberto Henschel
Michael J. Black
Bodo Rosenhahn
Gerard Pons-Moll
dcterms:description: A comprehensive collection of multi-person 3D poses captured in real-world scenarios with high variability. The dataset features 60 videos recorded at 30 fps using a phone, making it closer to real-world applications. IMU sensors are utilized to obtain near ground-truth SMPL parameters for multiple individuals in each frame. Activities include walking, sitting, and interactions with objects.
dcterms:title: 3DPW

dcterms:creator: Catalin Ionescu
Dragos Papava
Vlad Olaru
Cristian Sminchisescu
dcterms:description: This established benchmark dataset captures diverse human activities in a controlled indoor environment using high-resolution video. It offers a valuable resource for researchers due to its realism and variety of poses and interactions, including walking, posing, and other daily actions.
dcterms:title: Human3.6M
